item.title: Test
item.description: Introduction. In the rapidly evolving world of robotics and embedded systems, microROS is a game-changer. It brings the capabilities of ROS (Robot Operating System) 2 to microcontrollers, facilitating the development of robust and interactive systems. The Raspberry Pi Pico, with its powerful RP2040 chip, provides an excellent platform for such applications. This tutorial will guide you through setting up and running microROS on the Raspberry Pi Pico. The ability to publish and subscribe to topics directly from the microcontroller, a standout feature of microROS, allows for real-time communication and data exchange, fostering complex, coordinated behaviors.
